Old CERN-PAW docs


Here can be found very old docs of CERN-PAW.

WARNING, WARNING, WARNING: the content of these docs must be seen as hints for the behaviour of gopaw. A lot of things in these docs are related to operating systems no more around (VAX/VMS, IBM/VM-CMS,etc), related to some FORTRAN aspects (as the COMIS interpreter) not available in gopaw and way to handle storage (ZEBRA, HBOOK) not relevant in gopaw. Anyway a lot of things works also for gopaw.

http://paw.web.cern.ch

CERN-PAW manual, version 1.14 (July 1992).

Another pdf about CERN-PAW found on the web.

A CERN-PAW FAQs found on the web.
